remarks: The support of a mapping of a scalar multiplication with a function of scalars is a subset of the support of the function of scalars. (Contributed by AV, 5-Apr-2019.)
statement:
mndpsuppss.r $e |- R = ( Base ` M ) $.
mndpsuppss $p |- ( ( ( M e. Mnd /\ V e. X ) /\ ( A e. ( R ^m V ) /\ B e. ( R ^m V ) ) ) -> ( ( A oF ( +g ` M ) B ) supp ( 0g ` M ) ) C_ ( ( A supp ( 0g ` M ) ) u. ( B supp ( 0g ` M ) ) ) ) $.
